K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:203b-20: phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:203b-21: sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:203b-22: sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yi rang bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:203b-23: de la bdag ni yi rang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:203b-24: sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:203b-25: bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:203b-26: sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:203b-27: bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:203b-28: phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:203b-29: sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:203b-30: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-1: byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-2: sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-3: srog chags kun la sman slad du; ;chos kyi 'khor lo skor gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-4: chos rnga chen po sgra yis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-5: sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-6: bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-7: chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-9: srid pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-10: 'ching ba kun gyis bcings bdag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-11: rkang gnyis mchog rnams gzigs su gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-12: sems kyi dri mar bgyis pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-13: sangs rgyas rnams ni smod mi mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-14: sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-15: srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-16: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang; ;gang dag 'das dang ma byon pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-17: de dag rjes su bdag slob cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-18: byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-19: pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-20: 'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog; mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-21: bla med byang chub reg gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-22: ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-23: rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-24: rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-25: stong pa'i chos ni rtogs par shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-26: sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-27: sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204a-28: gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-0: bdag ma @204b mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-2: dngos po kun la mi gnas par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-3: sems can kun la bde slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-4: ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-5: dngos po dngos po ma mchis pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-6: bdag gis longs spyod lhun grub shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-7: dngos po thams cad rnam 'jig pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-8: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-9: khrims kyi tshul khrims skyon med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-10: tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-11: rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-12: tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-14: rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing; ;bzod pa'am khro ba ma mchis par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-15: bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-17: brtan spro le lo ma mchis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-18: stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-19: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-20: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-22: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-23: bsam gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-24: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-25: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-26: rig gsum mngon sum bgyis pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-27: shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog ;sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-29: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:204b-30: bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-2: byams pa grags dang ldan pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-3: pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-4: sa bcu po la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gang la gnas nas thabs la mkhas pas theg pa bde ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-8: lam bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-11: sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-14: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-15: phyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ci ma rung zhes de ltar zhing rnam par sbyangs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-17: dus de dang tshod de 'byung ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-18: de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dag 'dod chags chung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205a-21: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-0: de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa smon lam gyi dbang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par @205b 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-2: ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-3: snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-4: sems can 'dod chags kyi shas che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-5: zhe sdang gi shas che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-6: gti mug gi shas che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-10: chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-11: chags pa yang bas zil gyis non pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-12: chos log pas yongs su zin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-20: mkhan po dang slob dpon la 'khu ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-23: mi dri ma can dang; mi dmu rgod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-24: mi cang shes ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ci ma rung zhes de ltar smon lam yongs su sbyangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-25: dus yang ba 'di lta bu la gnas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-27: ngas snying rje chen po mdun du byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-28: snying rje chen po dang ldan pas nga da ltar grong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-34: 'khor rnams su zhugs te chos ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:205b-35: nga la kha ngan zer zhing gshe rgyab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-1: pa rlang pos smra bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-3: nga la chad pa smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-4: rtog par smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-5: 'khor 'dod pa mang po zhes kyang gleng ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-6: 'dod pa che'o zhes kyang gleng ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-7: khyim gyi nang na zhugs na yang nga la sas kyang 'thor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-8: dug dang bsres pa'i kha zas kyang byin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-9: me'i phung po yang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-11: sangs rgyas su gyur kyang mdzes ldan ma dang zhes bya ba lta bu 'khrig pa'i chos dang ldan pas nga la skur pa yang btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-12: kun dga' bo; nga ni snying rje chen po mdun du byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-13: snying rje chen po dang ldan pas da ltar sems can de lta bu de dag la chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-14: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-15: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-17: sems can de lta bu de dag la chos ston par mdzad pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul ba 'dul ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-19: khur chen po bsnams pa dka' ba mdzad pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-20: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206a-24: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag @206b par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul ba 'dul ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-2: dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa gang dag sems can de lta bu dag la chos sten pa ni dka' ba mdzad pa'o; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-3: 'di ltar snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-4: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-5: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-7: 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mdzad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-8: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi khyu mchog gi gnas 'di thos nas spu zing zhes bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-15: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon gyi smon lam yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-17: byang chub kyi dgongs pa 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-18: byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-20: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-21: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:206b-22: dge slong lnga brgya po dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:207a-0: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de @207a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:207a-5: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:207a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:207a-7: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:207a-8: byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:207a-9: 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:207a-10: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-006:207a-12: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
